title: Win Tickets to Pert Near Sandstone and the People Brothers Band at High Noon Saloon
text: October 15th - Isthmus On Tap Next Homebrew Competition at HopCat Join us to sample and vote on five homebrews. The winning brewer will advance to the finals at Isthmus Beer & Cheese, Jan 16, 2016 at the Alliant Energy Center. The winner there will be the next Isthmus beer brewed by WBC. more » The 7th annual Isthmus Beer and Cheese Fest will take place Saturday, January 16th, 2016 from 2-6 pm at the Alliant Energy Center in Madison. Tickets go on sale October 1st. more » ISTHMUS LIVE SESSIONS Isthmus Live Sessions: Dessa She may be the lone female member of Minneapolis hip-hop collective Doomtree, but that’s not all that makes Dessa stand out. She’s also a skilled poet with a college degree in philosophy and has released more novels than she has solo albums. more »
